name: Richard WALKER v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (TEMPLE UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL). Petition of Temple University Hospital
name_abbreviation: Walker v. Workers' Compensation Appeal Board

parties: Richard WALKER v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (TEMPLE UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL). Petition of Temple University Hospital.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 4th day of May, 2004, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is VACATED, see Caso v. WCAB, 790 A.2d 1078 (Pa.Cmwlth.2002), and the matter is REMANDED to the Commonwealth Court for consideration of Petitioner’s remaining claims raised before that tribunal.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
850 A.2d 617
Richard WALKER v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (TEMPLE UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL). Petition of Temple University Hospital.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 4, 2004.
